committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To establish a new Justice Department grant program to reduce the number of individuals incarcerated in local jails, reduce the number of days individuals are incarcerated in local jails, and support community-led local justice reinvestment.
short_title: Community First Pretrial Reform and Jail Decarceration Act

summary.text:
Community First Pretrial Reform and Jail Decarceration Act

This bill requires the Bureau of Justice Assistance within the Department of Justice to award grants to partnerships of tribal, territorial, and local governments and nonprofit organizations to reduce the number of individuals in local jails and the duration of their incarceration.

titles.title: To establish a new Justice Department grant program to reduce the number of individuals incarcerated in local jails, reduce the number of days individuals are incarcerated in local jails, and support community-led local justice reinvestment.
Community First Pretrial Reform and Jail Decarceration Act
